Player History
Drafted in 9th round, 101st overall pick, by Los Angeles in 2019...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/1/2019, off Bill Anderson (PIT)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/16/2019, off Jamaal Bray (MIL)...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/2019, hitting .362 with 8 HR, 28 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/1/2020, hitting .522 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/2020, hitting .378 with 2 HR, 22 RBI...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by New York on 2/14/2021 to a 1-year deal worth $5,500,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/15/2021, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 4 RBI...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
